titles.title: New Zealand Military Preference Elimination Act
A bill to eliminate security assistance and arms export preferences for New Zealand, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations requested executive comment from State Department.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. New Zealand Military Preference Elimination Act - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 and the Arms Export Control Act to eliminate certain security assistance and arms export preferences for New Zealand.
